result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case called: 8:37 am 
INCLUDES 15CM1638 & 16CF115.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Zach Glascock;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
15CM1638:
Ct. 1 (4th Degree Sexual Assault)>>DRI.
Ct. 2  (4th Degree Sexual Assault)>>DRI.
Ct. 3  (4th Degree Sexual Assault)>>DRI.

16CF115:
Ct. 1 (2nd Degree Sexual Assault of a Child)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (2nd Degree Sexual Assault of a Child)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (3rd Degree Sexual Assault)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
16CF115:
Ct. 2 (3rd Degree Sexual Assault)>> NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
Parties make sentencing arguments. Defendant makes statement. 
Court addresses the parties. 

COURT ORDERS: 
16CF115:
Ct. 2 (3rd Degree Sexual Assault)>> Sentence W/H- 5 Years Probation. CONDITIONS: Impose 1 Year MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, Stay 6 Months MCJ, and Serve 6 Months MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, Complete Sex Offender Treatment, Counseling as recommended, No Contact with Victims M.B. & N.K.R., and No Contact with Females Under the Age of 18 unless approved by agent (not including family members within reason), Register with the Sex Offender Registry for 15 Years, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Defendant has 45 Days to report to MCJ.

REPORT TO BE SEALED.
VICTIM IMPACT STATEMENT TO BE SEALED.
